name: fireback
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a flat decorated piece of iron that stands against the back of a fireplace (= a space in the wall of a room for a fire to burn in): The continual heating and cooling of a fireback can eventually make it crack. You can buy antique fire backs online.
More examplesFewer examplesTraditional open fires need a fireback to reflect heat out into the room and protect the brickwork.Position the fireback so that its front edge meets the back of the fire surround.He's about as senstive as a fire back.
